original_text: And they shall teach my people the difference between the holy and profane, and cause them to discern between the unclean and the clean.
korean_text: 내 백성에게 거룩한 것과 속된 것의 구별을 가르치며 부정한 것과 정한 것을 분별하게 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: And they shall teach my people
the difference between holy and profane
sentences.korean_translation: 거룩한 것과 속된 것 사이의 차이를

sentences.original_text: between the unclean and the clean
